prompt: Using the following information, generate a professional resume in [template #1] format: Name: Jane Doe, Email: jane@example.com, Phone: 123-456-7890, Career Objective: Entry-level software engineer seeking growth opportunities..., Education: BSc in Computer Science, XYZ University, 2022..., Work Experience: Intern at ABC Corp, Assisted with..., Skills: JavaScript, Python, React. Certifications: AWS Certified.
